programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Gaels (24-4, 14-1 WCC) seek their first regular-season sweep of the rival Bulldogs (21-7, 12-3) since 2016. First-place Saint Mary's has won 14 of its last 15, including a 62-58 win over Gonzaga. The Gaels are 7-1 in true road games.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: WCC Tournament: Pepperdine vs. Saint Mary's (Calif.)
programme.desc: The upstart No. 9 Waves face the No. 1 Gaels in the West Coast Conference Tournament semifinals. Pepperdine bounced No. 4 Santa Clara 78-76 after upsetting Portland and Oregon State. Saint Mary's beat Pepperdine twice en route to a 17-1 WCC record.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: WCC Tournament: Gonzaga vs. Saint Mary's (Calif.)
programme.desc: The No. 1 Gaels face the No. 2 Bulldogs once again in the West Coast Conference final. The programs have combined to win the past 16 WCC titles, with Saint Mary's ending Gonzaga's four-year reign in 2024. The Gaels swept the regular-season series.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Sun Devils fly with the No. 11 Jayhawks. Kansas bounced back after suffering its first conference-opening loss since 1991 on Dec. 31, 2024, by trouncing UCF 99-48 on Jan. 5. Arizona State beat Colorado 81-61 behind 19 points from BJ Freeman.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 2 Cyclones (14-1, 4-0 Big 12) play the No. 9 Jayhawks (12-3, 3-1). Iowa State has won 11 in a row after prevailing in a nail-biter at Texas Tech. Joshua Jefferson sent the game to overtime and scored the winning free throws in the 85-84 win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 12 Jayhawks (13-4, 4-2) try to keep a grip on the Big 12 foe Horned Frogs (10-7, 3-3). Kansas leads the series 26-4, but TCU won two of the last six meetings. Jayhawks center Hunter Dickinson averages 15.8 points and 10.2 rebounds per game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Big 12 heavyweights clash as the No. 7 Cougars (15-3, 7-0) visit the No. 12 Jayhawks (14-4, 5-2). Houston has won 11 in a row. The home side won both 2023-24 meetings. Kansas senior Hunter Dickinson averaged 17.2 points over his last six outings.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks host a rematch with the No. 8 Cyclones. Kansas leads the all-time series 190-69, but Iowa State has won three of the past four after a 74-57 decision Jan. 15. Curtis Jones (ISU) torched Kansas for 25 points with five 3-pointers.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks (16-6, 7-4 Big 12) meet the Wildcats (11-11, 5-6) for a Sunflower Showdown. Kansas added to its record amount of wins against Kansas State with its 206th on Jan. 18, as Hunter Dickinson's 25 points paced an 84-74 Jayhawks victory.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Greek natives and their kin built the Birmingham restaurant scene, from barbecue joints to hotdog stands to steakhouses. Bright Star, founded in 1907, is the old guard and Johnny's is the new guard Greek restaurant.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Pablo Rivadeneyra rotisserie-cooks lime-marinated chicken. Larry and Betty Jean Scott work a smoke-belching pit at Scott's BBQ. In these two places, we get a glimpse of the hard work that defines life in the South.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Sands, the soul food café, cooks oxtails and cabbage and ropy okra; Arnold's Country Kitchen, Kahlil Arnold dishes created corn, hashed turnip greens, and fried green tomatoes; the differences between black and white cooking come into focus.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Herby K's is a 1936 vintage beer garden and fry house. Lucky Palace serves wol-fried-t-bones and pork egg foo young. Both of these restaurants are survivors, like Shreveport itself.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: If you're a local of New Orleans, you might recognize West African borrowings in music and food but Italian New Orleans has been largely forgotten.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: This is a story about a scrappy onetime oil boomtown, where cooks make the most of scraps and the oppressiveness of brisket and how popular narratives have obscured two Gulf Coast dishes that manage to hang on.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: In the southern towns of Hodgenville and Bardstown, Kentucky, conflicting ideas about identity and purpose come into focus. In these Southern towns, onion burgers and country sausage prove constants in a time of great change.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: Just as there are many Souths, black Memphis reveals itself to be varied and complex and beautiful, Here, we see the streets of Memphis and its classic spots Pop's Hot Tamales, Lee Crumb, and Ms. Girlee's.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: A look at Oxford, Miss., the home of Ole Miss, as well as writer/host John T. Edge and executive producer Wright Thompson.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Set in the future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, a man struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must go on the run before the heart is repossessed.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A cop must arm prisoners to help fend off an attack by gunmen who want to kill a gangster locked away in the crumbling station.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a man witnesses the death of his young son when the boy gets caught in crossfire between warring gangs. Recovering from a wound that cost him his voice, he soon embarks on a bloody and grueling quest to punish those responsible.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Members (Naomi Watts, Jack Black, Adrien Brody) of a film crew encounter prehistoric beasts and a gigantic ape on mysterious Skull Island.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry find new inspiration in a rising R&B singer; together, they plan to launch a new record label; Terry hatches his own plan to regain control in St. Louis.

programme.title: Movie

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: Meech and Terry find new inspiration in a rising R&B singer; together, they plan to launch a new record label; Terry hatches his own plan to regain control in St. Louis.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: Soulmates Eric Draven and Shelly Webster are brutally murdered when the demons of her dark past catch up with them. Traversing the worlds of the living and the dead, Draven returns to seek bloody revenge against the killers.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: After responding to Internet trolls, a man becomes haunted by the ghost of a dead child named David. Based on the viral Twitter thread by BuzzFeed comic artist Adam Ellis.

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: A girl in Nazi-occupied France goes into hiding with help from a schoolmate -- a boy who risks everything to give her the chance to survive. Together, they find first love in a stunning, magical world of their own creation.

programme.desc: A biology teacher moonlights as a mixed martial arts fighter to raise money to save his school's music program.

programme.desc: A young actress claiming to have been the victim of a white slavery ring becomes the prime suspect when a wealthy Japanese businessman is murdered.

programme.desc: After the body of a wealthy woman is found in the East River, her daughter and her husband become murder suspects.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A safe-deposit-box company eventually exposes a political activist who went underground 20 years earlier to avoid a murder charge.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe, Logan, McCoy and Kincaid try to clear Van Buren's name after she shoots a pair of young men who accost her at an automated teller machine.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A girl found dead in a cooler may have been the victim of parents suffering from an unusual psychological illness.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Kincaid find themselves in a unique situation when a high-powered city attorney accuses a city councilman of sexual harassment.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A corporate raider is linked to the murder of a sleazy lawyer who planned a class action suit against him.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A juror bribed to throw the trial of a crime boss is murdered; the mobster's attorney is arrested for the crime.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a wealthy socialite's estranged daughter is killed, the detectives are led to the accountant responsible for the young woman's trust fund.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Kincaid and McCoy are determined to convict both the man who shot an abortion doctor and the activist whose rhetoric may have encouraged the incident.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The probe of a Wall Street executive's murder leads to a top broker who has a history of criminal behavior.

programme.desc: The investigation of a pornographer leads to a gang of teens who videotape their sexual exploits with female classmates.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The probe of a woman's attempt on her husband's life leads to a fertility doctor with a high rate of success.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Expelled from an exclusive boys school, an underprivileged youth, a gifted student, is suspected of a trustee's murder.

programme.desc: The stabbing murder of a husband and wife prompts Briscoe and Logan to investigate Steven Bartlett, an alcoholic who was abused as a child.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a fellow detective and childhood friend forces Logan to deal with repressed memories about the school he attended.

programme.desc: A Mayberry resident is convinced he is a jinx until Andy helps restore his self-confidence.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
